mapper.insert: insert into ev_board (ev_idx, ev_sellcvs, ev_subject, ev_content, ev_notice, ev_filename, id, nickname) values (ev_board_idx_seq.nextval, #{ev_sellcvs}, #{ev_subject}, #{ev_content}, #{ev_notice}, #{ev_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: update ev_board set ev_hit = ev_hit + 1 where ev_idx = #{ev_idx}
update ev_board set ev_sellcvs = #{ev_sellcvs} ,ev_subject = #{ev_subject}, ev_content = #{ev_content}, ev_notice = #{ev_notice} where ev_idx = #{ev_idx}
mapper.select: select * from ev_board where ev_notice = 'yes' order by ev_idx desc
